name: Pete'sPoints-BusinessandLeadershipStrategies
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Since 2018, former Disney University leader Pete Blank has been creating and producing daily Flash Briefings for business professionals and leaders in all industries. These short two-minute tips will help you lead people, manage processes, and develop professionally.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
